m_szDocTitle: Toyota Hawaii brings 2016 Mirai production cars to state - Hawaii News Now - KGMB and KHNL
m_szDocSumamry: Toyota Hawaii brings 2016 Mirai production cars to state - Hawaii News Now - KGMB and KHNL Member Center: Toyota Hawaii brings 2016 Mirai production cars to state Posted: Updated: HONOLULU (HawaiiNewsNow) - Toyota Hawaii has brought the first Mirai production vehicles to Oahu. Hawaii is the second state after California to receive the Mirai, Toyota’s first hydrogen-powered fuel cell vehicle (FCV). The Mirai launched in October in California. “FCVs like the Mirai truly represent the future,” said Rick Ching, president of Servco Automotive. “The Mirai is the ultimate clean car – it emits nothing
